
## Dredged Cumulative

```{r dredged-cum, echo = FALSE}
# expects parameters file1, file2, type1, type2
dc1 = read_dc(file1, type1)
dc2 = read_dc(file2, type2)
dc.diff = diff_dc(dc1, dc2)
dc.rmse.station = rmse_dc(dc.diff, "Station")
dc.rmse.time = rmse_dc(dc.diff, "Time")

dc.diff %>% ggplot() + plot.theme +
  aes(x = Station, y = diff_dc) + geom_boxplot() +
  ylab("Difference") +
  ggtitle("Dredged Cumulative Differences at Stations")
dc.rmse.station %>% ggplot() + plot.theme +
  aes(x = Station, y = rmse_dc) +
  geom_col() + ylab("RMSE") +
  ggtitle("Dredged Cumulative RMSE at Stations")
dc.rmse.time %>% mutate(Time = as.POSIXct(Time, format = "%d%b%Y %M:%S",
    tz = "UTC")) %>% ggplot() + plot.theme +
  aes(x = Time, y = rmse_dc) + geom_line() +
  scale_x_datetime(date_labels = "%b %Y") + 
  ylab("RMSE") +
  ggtitle("Dredged Cumulative RMSE Through Time")
```
